Class PlayerState

Namespace
Pig.Core

Pig.Core.dll

Represents an immutable snapshot of a player's standing within the game.

public record PlayerState : IEquatable<PlayerState>
Inheritance
object
PlayerState
Implements
IEquatable<PlayerState>
Inherited Members
object.Equals(object)

object.GetType()
object.MemberwiseClone()
object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)
object.ToString()

Remarks

Since this is a record type, it provides built-in value-based equality. In the functional game loop, player scores are updated by creating a new instance of this record with an updated TotalScore.

Constructors

PlayerState(string, int)

Represents an immutable snapshot of a player's standing within the game.

public PlayerState(string Name, int TotalScore)

Parameters

Name string

The display name or identifier for the player.

TotalScore int

The cumulative banked score earned by the player across all completed turns.

Remarks

Since this is a record type, it provides built-in value-based equality. In the functional game loop, player scores are updated by creating a new instance of this record with an updated TotalScore.
